block.p: Leslie Knowles Bathgate, a daughter of T. Pamela Bathgate of Rumson, N.J., and Lawrence E. Bathgate II of Bay Head, N.J., was married yesterday to Andrew Peter Heaney, the son of Joan M. Heaney of Upper Brookville, N.Y., and the late Peter F. Heaney. The Rev. Herbert G. Draesel Jr. performed the ceremony at All Saints Episcopal Church in Bay Head.

Later this month, Mrs. Heaney, 26, will begin her third year at Fordham University Law School. She graduated from Occidental College in Los Angeles. Her father, who was the finance chairman of the Republican National Committee from 1987 to 1992, is the senior partner in Bathgate, Wegener & Wolf, a law firm in Lakewood, N.J.

Leslie Knowles Bathgate, a daughter of T. Pamela Bathgate of Rumson, N.J., and Lawrence E. Bathgate II of Bay Head, N.J., was married yesterday to Andrew Peter Heaney, the son of Joan M. Heaney of Upper Brookville, N.Y., and the late Peter F. Heaney. The Rev. Herbert G. Draesel Jr. performed the ceremony at All Saints Episcopal Church in Bay Head.

Later this month, Mrs. Heaney, 26, will begin her third year at Fordham University Law School. She graduated from Occidental College in Los Angeles. Her father, who was the finance chairman of the Republican National Committee from 1987 to 1992, is the senior partner in Bathgate, Wegener & Wolf, a law firm in Lakewood, N.J.

Mr. Heaney, 27, graduated from Yale University and is a candidate for an M.B.A. at Harvard. He also owns Heat USA, a home heating oil cooperative, and Fuelbuyer.com, an online fuel-oil exchange that he founded, both in Manhattan. His father was the owner of Skaggs-Walsh, a heating oil distributor in College Point, Queens.
